pages.text: Earth Node veins generate underground in the Overworld between y-levels -64 and 0 (configurable). They drop 1 Earth Gem.
Water Node veins generate underground in Ocean biomes between y-levels 40 and 27 (configurable). They drop 1 Water Gem.
Fire Node veins generate in the Nether between y-levels 10 and 117 (configurable). They drop 1 Fire Gem.
End Node veins generate anywhere inside of end islands throughout the End. They drop 1 End Gem.
Sky node veins generate in small clouds in the Overloard. The clouds generate between y 192 and 196, also containing bits of iron. The nodes drop 1 Sky Gem.
